name: Experience Real Trains 2019
description:
Experience Real Trains 2019 is the latest edition of train driving. This realistic simulation provides the best experience of driving trains. Become a train driver and drive all kinds of modern trains. Pick up passengers from one station and drop them off to other stations. Try to reach the station on time as the passengers will get annoyed if the train is late.
Features:
- Tracks changing and fully functional signalling system.
- Multiple weather and exclusive night mode.
- Change the camera view as per your comfort.
- Realistic station and passengers simulator.
- Realistic People Animations.
